name: Visual Studio Code Analysis Rule Set File
summary: Learn about .RULESET files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Rule sets allow developers to define specific conditions for testing static segments of program code. This helps catch errors early in the development process.
For Visual Studio 2010, RULESET files are located in the Microsoft Visual Studio 10.0\​Team Tools\​Static Analysis Tools\​Rule Sets\​ directory.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
